There's a way to run the same profile on different devices (desktop and mobile) but it requires transfer of the profile through ADB (which by some, may be considered insecure) and only the device which initiated communication receives messages from other party.
no other type of locking at the moment

For 1/1 chats it's not possible to send message when contact offline, when online text input is available. No indication in group chat about members status. https://docs.cwtch.im/docs/profiles/availability-status/
